---
title: "A long-running piece of code"
date: "2025-08-01"
author: "Charlotte Hadley"
---

To create a post with a tuneable runtime I'm using `time.sleep()`

::: {#052bdea0 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from time import sleep
sleep(5)
print("Hello sleepy world")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Hello sleepy world
```
:::
:::




::: {#0a6b8bb8 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from plotnine import ggplot, geom_point, aes, stat_smooth, facet_wrap
(
    ggplot(penguins_cleaned, aes("bill_length_mm",
           "flipper_length_mm", color="factor(island)"))
    + geom_point()
)
```
